txt.en: Your mission is to defeat hobgoblins in Vorkodar.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Vorkodar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have located a den of fearsome hobgoblins deep in the mountains. They call themselves the Frost-bound; they are zealots willingly enslaved to Hrímil Frost-heart and her horde. Too dangerous to remain alive, I say. I task you with entering their lair and defeating as many as you can!'
Complete Mission: Den of the Frost-bound
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Hobgoblins' lair. Good luck.'
'Good work, [placeholder]. The more of these brutes we defeat in their dens, the fewer we have to deal with in the battle the come!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
The fearsome hobgoblins have sworn themselves to the Frost-horde and gained terrible power in return….\n\nYour mission is to defeat the hobgoblins inside Vorkodar.
You have been tasked with defeating hobgoblins in Vorkodar.
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
